settings.heading: Details
settings.content:
• Official licensed collectible series
  • Unique mystery box experience
  • Effortless assembly, endless fun
  • 17-point articulation for dynamic posing
  • Customizable armor system
  • Engaging battle card game

Rise of the Dragon figures reimagine Three Kingdoms & Investiture heroes. Quick-build, highly detailed 7.5cm figures with customizable armor. Each surprise box contains a quick-assembly figure with 17 points of articulation, removable armor, and exclusive battle cards. The series features 9 unique characters blending Chinese warrior heritage with sci-fi elements, plus chase variants for added collectibility. Perfect for both play and display.

settings.heading: Shopping Tips
settings.content:
Complete Set Purchase: Each suprise figurine in the set is unique, ensuring a diverse collection without duplicates.

Single Suprise Purchase: Purchasing suprise figurines individually may result in receiving duplicate figures.

settings.heading: Shipping Terms
settings.content:
Orders in stock are usually shipped within the United State within 2-7 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to the email address attached to the order once the order has shipped. 

Please Note: International shipping is not currently available.

settings.heading: Product Care
settings.content:
Suprise Rules:

  1. For individuals aged 9 and above, please purchase suprise products under the supervision of a guardian. Kids under the age of 9 are not advised to make purchases.
  2. The packaging for these products contains small parts; do not swallow them, and do not allow kids under 3 years of age to use these toys.
  3. Suprise products are unique and random. Once opened, they cannot be returned or exchanged.

settings.heading: Return
settings.content:
You can return your Blokees order within 30 days of receipt. Please make sure the collectibles you received are in unused condition with the tags and packaging intact. If you've opened the toy it can not be returned. Start your return by emailing us at service@blokees.com.. Upon receiving and inspecting your item, a refund will be processed within 10 business days according to the original method of payment.

Please Note:

  1. Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.
  2. Blokees only supports company products sold from authorized sellers in the US and the company websites.

settings.heading: Help Center
settings.content: To contact Blokees' customer service department, please email service@blokees.com or fill out the form on the contact page.

settings.heading: Packaging Contents
settings.content:
Suprise Set Box Composition: 9 Hero Infinity Blokees Figures (may have three special figures)

  • Hero Infinity Figure x 9
  • Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture (depends on the Figures)
  • Display Stand x 9
  • Card x 9
  • Armor x 9
  • Instruction Manual x 1
  • Hero Duel Comics x 9

settings.text: With 1500w ebike conversion kit, Its affordability, and versatility, You can turn the bike you love electric at a fraction of the cost of an eBike, for all your all-terrain adventures.

settings.icon_2_text: Package Size: 72*72*120 mm (Single Box), 220*220*125 mm (Set Box)

settings.heading: Detail
settings.content:
Dive into the Transformers universe with Blokees Figures Galaxy Version 05 ONE! This collection brings the origins story to life with 9 iconic characters from the "Transformers: One" movie. Each figure features an impressive 20+ points of articulation, allowing for incredibly dynamic poses and endless play possibilities.

What makes this set truly special? First, the surprise factor - hunt for the rare metallic Optimus Prime, hidden at a 1:36 ratio! Plus, each character comes with interchangeable accessories and weapons, letting you customize your display or battle scenes.

We're constantly improving playability, with new features added in each iteration. Whether you're recreating movie moments or imagining new adventures, these highly detailed figures offer both hardcore fans and newcomers an exciting way to experience the birth of the Autobot-Decepticon conflict.

settings.heading: Packaging Contents
settings.content:
Each Single Suprise Contains:

  • Transformer Figure x 1
  • Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture (depends on the Figures)
  • Display Stand x 1
  • Instruction Manual x 1
  • Collector's Card x 1

Series Composition: 9 Transformers Blokees Figures (may have one special figure).

settings.block_text: Expertly crafted 7.5cm action figures featuring 17 points of articulation, premium ABS construction, and superior paint applications. Each officially licensed figure comes in a collector-grade surprise box, offering unboxing experience.

Every purchase is an adventure with the mystery surprise box format. Each box holds the surprise of discovering one of the nine characters, including ultra-rare Galaxy (1/108), Golden (4/108), and Silver (2/108) hidden variants.
Enjoy the hands-on building experience without the hassle. With a simple 2-3 minute assembly time, these figures are designed for ease, blending fast assembly with high replay value.

Fully removable and interchangeable armor system with character-specific battle suits. Mix-and-match capabilities across figures, featuring detailed weapons and accessories that enhance play value and display options.
Detailed: Fusion of classic Chinese warriors and futuristic sci-fi elements. Two opposing factions (The Future vs The Doom) with rich character backstories and authentic design elements.

Each figure comes with a battle card, enabling engaging, strategic play. Using rock-paper-scissors mechanics and character-specific attributes, challenge friends and dive into a unique battle experience.

settings.title: Epic Hero Collection
settings.sub_title: Explore Endless Creativity with Every Block
settings.desc: Discover legendary Chinese heroes in our upgraded comic series. Collect them all and complete your adventure!

settings.title: Basic Rules
settings.text_1:
1. Each hero has one attribute: Rock, Paper, or Scissors
  2. Each player needs 3+ heroes (no duplicates)
  3. Place your heroes face-up in front of you

settings.title: How to Play
settings.text_1:
1. Players do Rock-Paper-Scissors
  2. Winner chooses any hero (their own or opponent's) to enter battle
  3. Heroes battle using their Rock-Paper-Scissors attributes
settings.text_2:
4. Win = 2 points, Draw = 1 point each

5. Each hero can battle only once

6. Game ends when one player has no heroes left

7. Highest score wins

settings.title: Special Heroes
settings.text_1:
Mythical Aspect Heroes:

  • It has two attributes (Rock/Paper, Paper/Scissors, or Rock/Scissors)
  • Can flip once per battle to change attribute
  • Must choose one attribute before battle

settings.title: Creation Heroes
settings.text_1:
• Can combine with other heroes
  • Combining heroes earns 1 bonus point
  • Combined hero uses new card's attribute

settings.title: Hero Battle Card Game - Quick Rules
settings.sub_title: The More Cards You Collect, the Greater the Adventure!

settings.block_text: This authentic, licensed series ensures high quality and collectibility for fans and enthusiasts aged 9 and above.
Build, play, and display your hero in minutes! Each figure features removable armor, weapons, and 17 points of articulation for endless action possibilities.
Hunt for amazing hidden editions! Find Galaxy Hidden (1/108), Golden Hidden (1/9), and exclusive variants that'll make your collection legendary.
Ready for battle in 2-3 minutes! Easy assembly means more time for epic adventures and storytelling with your heroes.
Mix and match awesome armor pieces! Equip your warriors with interchangeable gear inspired by ancient Chinese armor designs.
Master the rock-paper-scissors combat system! Each hero comes with unique battle cards and special abilities for strategic gameplay.
Show off your heroes! Each figure includes a display stand and features incredible details that look amazing in any collection.
Get more than just a figure! Includes bonus battle cards, character backstories, and special combat rules for extended play value.

settings.heading: Dragon Legacy: Rising Heroes
settings.text: Build, Battle & Collect - The Ultimate Action Figure Experience

settings.content_text: My kids can’t get enough! Assembly is quick, and then they’re off battling with armor and cool weapons. They’re already hoping for a rare Galaxy edition. Fun, easy, and keeps them entertained!
The rock-paper-scissors card game brings a fresh twist to collectible figures. I’ve had a blast strategizing with friends. Plus, these figures look incredible lined up on display!

I bought one for my nephew but kept it for myself! The attention to detail is impressive, and the hidden editions like Galaxy Hidden are just next-level cool. It’s a unique mix of mythology and modern design.

Scored a Golden Hidden figure for my nephew’s birthday – he was thrilled! Each one feels special, especially with the surprise box format. The design is on point, and it’s honestly fun to hunt down the rare editions!

These figures are so easy to put together! My kids get right to playtime in a few minutes, and the armor-swapping adds loads of imaginative play. These are quality collectibles they keep coming back to.
He’s been playing with the figure nonstop, swapping armor and creating scenes with the card game. These are really well-made, durable, and they look so cool. I might need to start my own collection!
Quality and fun, but we need more characters! My little brother loves the card battles, and I can’t lie – I’ve gotten into it too. We just wish there were even more unique characters to collect.
This figure has become a fun talking point at work. The details and the mix-and-match armor make it an impressive little piece to show off. And the compact size is perfect for my desk!
When I found the Galaxy Hidden figure, I was hooked! The thrill of discovering these hidden gems, mixed with the high-quality design, makes this a must-have for any collector.
These are built tough enough to handle my boys’ play. The twins love swapping the armor and creating new scenes every day. Great design, durable, and a big hit with the kids!
Fun and easy to assemble, great for play or display. The design and the mystery of what you’ll find in each box keep me wanting more. Excited to keep adding to my collection!

settings.content_title: Classic Legends with a Modern Touch!
settings.content_text: These figures are like mini warriors inspired by Chinese legends, with a sci-fi twist. They’re fun for kids but cool enough for adults. I bought one for my nephew but might start collecting myself!
It started as a gift for my son, but now I’m hooked too! The rare editions and the card game add so much value. They’re fun to collect and even more fun to display.

settings.video_title_host: The Transformers of Fractured Space-Time?! Blokees Galaxy Version 04 Unboxings

settings.block_title: What is Hero Infinity Galaxy Version Turbo 03 | Rise of the Dragon?
settings.block_text: Hero Infinity Galaxy Version Turbo 03 | Rise of the Dragon is a series of collectible surprise box figures featuring characters inspired by the Three Kingdoms and Investiture of the Gods, reimagined with a futuristic, sci-fi aesthetic. These figures are highly detailed, posable, and come with interchangeable armor and weapons. They also include a card battle game element for added playability and collectibility.

settings.block_title: What makes these figures different from other collectible toys?
settings.block_text: These figures stand out due to several key features: their detailed 7.5cm size (larger than competitors at the same price point), high-quality construction and articulation (17 points of articulation), interchangeable armor and weapons, the unique blend of historical and futuristic design, and the integrated card battle game that adds a strategic element to collecting. The quick 2-3 minute assembly allows for more focus on play and customization.

settings.block_title: How does the surprise box system work?
settings.block_text: Each box contains one random figure. There are 9 regular figures and 3 hidden variants (Golden, Silver, and Galaxy) with varying rarity. The thrill of the chase is part of the fun! While a full case contains all 9 regular figures, individual surprise boxes offer the chance to uncover rare and highly sought-after hidden editions.

settings.block_title: What are the different rarity levels for the hidden figures?
settings.block_text:
• Golden Hidden (Guan Yu Battle Suit): 1/9 chance (or one per full case)
  • Silver Hidden (Cao Cao Divine Armour): 1/27 chanceGalaxy
  • Hidden (Divine Horse Red Hare): 1/108 chance

settings.block_title: What is the card battle game and how do I play?
settings.block_text: The included cards feature a rock-paper-scissors mechanic. Each character has a designated attribute (rock, paper, or scissors). Players choose characters to battle, and the winner is determined by the classic rock-paper-scissors rules. Special rules apply to "Divine Armour" and "Artifact" characters, allowing for attribute switching and equipment combinations, respectively, adding layers of strategy to the game.

settings.block_title: What is the recommended age range for these figures?
settings.block_text: The recommended age range is 9+ years due to small parts and the strategic elements of the card game. However, younger children may enjoy the figures with adult supervision.

settings.block_title: What materials are the figures made of?
settings.block_text: The figures are primarily made of ABS plastic, known for its durability and ability to hold fine details.

"Battle Suits" are specialized armor sets that enhance a character's appearance and potentially their stats in the card game. "Divine Armours" are particularly powerful and rare armor sets that often come with special abilities within the card game, such as dual rock-paper-scissors attributes.

settings.block_title: What is the significance of the "Divine Horse Red Hare"?
settings.block_text: The Divine Horse Red Hare is a highly sought-after "Artifact" character in the series. It's a robotic mount compatible with characters from previous series, adding a new dimension to display and play. Its rarity contributes to its desirability among collectors.

settings.block_title: What if there's a quality issue with my figure?
settings.block_text: Please contact our customer support team, and we'll be happy to assist you.

settings.block_title: When will single Hero Infinity figures figures be sold separately?
settings.block_text: Currently, we offer the 9-figure Surprise Set Box. We're exploring different options for future releases and will announce any updates as soon as we can. Stay tuned for Blokees!
